stork.feather.util

Class Throughput

  • java.lang.Object
    • stork.feather.util.Throughput

  • public class Throughput
extends Object
    A class for keeping track of instantaneous throughput. Also provides some utility methods for formatting throughput.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static Throughput global 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Throughput()
      Create a Throughput with the default quantum (3000ms).
      Throughput(double quantum)
      Create a Throughput with the given quantum.
      Throughput(double bytes, double time)
      Create a Throughput from time and progress.
